title: Enrollment Percentage per Course
description: Write a query to show for each course, what percentage of all students are enrolled. Display course_name and pct_enrolled (rounded to 1 decimal place).
hint: Count enrolled students per course, divide by total number of students, multiply by 100. Use ROUND().
solution: SELECT courses.course_name, ROUND(COUNT(enrollments.student_id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM students), 1) as pct_enrolled FROM courses LEFT JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY courses.course_name
